history.proof: intros. unfold distinct_pairs_and in *. induction l1 as [| a l1' IHl1]. - auto. - simpl. split. + intros z Hz. hauto use: in_app_iff, in_eq. + apply IHl1. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M A : Type R : A -> A -> Prop a : A l1', l2 : list A H : (forall y : A, In y l1' -> R a y) /\\ (fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end) A R l1' H0 : (fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end) A R l2 H1 : forall x y : A, In x (a :: l1') -> In y l2 -> R x y IHl1 : (fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end) A R l1' -> (forall x y : A, In x l1' -> In y l2 -> R x y) -> (fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end) A R (l1' ++ l2) Unable to unify "R ?M1660 ?M1661" with "(fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end) A R l1'".

original: intros A R l1 l2 H1 H2 H3 x y H4 H5. unfold distinct_pairs_and in *. induction l1 as [| a l1' IHl1]. - auto. - simpl. split. + intros z Hz. apply H1. now right. + apply IHl1. * intros z Hz. apply H1. now left. * apply H4. now left. * apply H3. now left.
